data.blogText: Hey everyone, my name is Mahima Sunmoriya. I'm here creating this first reactJS website. Thus this is my first post on the react website.

Well... it's been 15 days in the debugging bunker. The first signs of daylight are protruding through the lines of code.If you can read this then that must mean I am on the right track. Hopefully this will be completed in time.
Oh yeah! Everything seems to be in order here. The site is up and running. Purring like a beaute. Hopefully things wil continue in this direction. Singing off for now...
